biotools.summary: A fast and memory-efficient method for haplotype assembly from long gapless reads, like those produced by SMRT sequencing technologies (PacBio RS II) and Oxford Nanopore flow cell technologies (MinION).

bioschemas.name: HapCol
bioschemas.summary: A fast and memory-efficient method for haplotype assembly from long gapless reads, like those produced by SMRT sequencing technologies (PacBio RS II) and Oxford Nanopore flow cell technologies (MinION).
